browser_does_not_support_video: Your browser does not support the video tag
who_is_lucky_one: Who's the lucky one? What's the occasion? What's your budget? Give us some details to start the magic.
done_with_details: Done with the details? Great! Now just hit the magic button and let us do the heavy lifting.
voila_gift_ideas: Voila! Here's your personalized list of gift ideas, crafted just for you by our AI.
user_friendly_interface: Our user-friendly interface makes finding the perfect gift as easy as pie. No fuss, no muss.
personalized_gift_ideas: Our AI crafts a personalized list of gift ideas based on the unique details you provide. No more generic gift suggestions!
comfortable_in_english_or_spanish: Whether you're more comfortable in English or Spanish, we've got you covered.
day_or_night_we_got_the_look: Day or Night, We've Got the Look
choose_light_dark_theme: Choose between our light and dark themes for the perfect browsing experience, any time of day.
add_to_favorites: See something you like? Add it to your favorites and come back to it anytime. Just remember to sign in first!
ready_to_find_gift: Ready to find the perfect gift?
storm_of_gift_ideas: A storm of personalized gift ideas at your fingertips
essential_cookies_text: Essential cookies are used for service functionality, and optional cookies to enhance your experience and analyze site traffic.

legal_center.title: Legal Center - Giftstorming Ai
legal_center.intro: At Giftstorming Ai, we are committed to transparency and the security of our users. Below you will find links to our legal documents that describe the practices and policies we govern.
legal_center.privacy_policy_desc2: describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal_center.terms_and_conditions_desc2: govern the use of our services and set forth the rules and guidelines for using our website and products.
legal_center.cookies_policy_desc2: explains how we use cookies to enhance your online experience.
legal_center.contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our policies or practices, please do not hesitate to contact us at

cookies.title: Cookies Policy - Giftstorming Ai
cookies.heading: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: On our website, we value your privacy and transparency. Therefore, we want to explain how we use cookies to enhance your online experience.
cookies.what_are_cookies_desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow us to remember your preferences, offer faster navigation, and understand how you interact with our site.
cookies.experience_personalized_desc: We remember your preferences and previous visits to offer you a more personalized and relevant experience.
cookies.navigation_improvement_desc: We analyze how you use our site to optimize navigation and offer content and advertising that interests you.
cookies.security_desc: We use cookies to verify your identity, keep your session active, and ensure a safe experience on our site.
cookies.essential_cookies_desc: Fundamental for the operation and security of our site, they limit access to certain features to unregistered users and prevent abuse of free features.
cookies.google_analytics_desc: Helps us understand which areas of our site are popular and where we can improve.
cookies.mixpanel_desc: Allows us to understand how you interact with our site and improve our features.
cookies.authentication_cookies_desc: If you choose to log in to our site, these cookies verify your identity and keep your session active, offering you a personalized and safe experience. They are deleted when closing the browser or logging out.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Giftstorming Ai
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.information_we_collect_desc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, password, and any other information you submit through our website or during your interaction with our services.
privacy.information_automatically_collected_desc: We may automatically collect information about your use of our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and visit duration. This information helps us understand how visitors use our site and improve their experience.
privacy.provide_services: Provide, maintain, and improve our website and services.
privacy.send_communications: Send communications, including promotions and news about our products and services.
privacy.respond_to_requests: Respond to your questions and requests.
privacy.analyze_activity: Analyze and monitor activity on our website to prevent fraud and improve the quality of our services.
privacy.share_and_disclose_information_desc: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for their own marketing purposes, unless you have given us explicit permission to do so. We may share your information with service providers that assist us in our operations, always under strict confidentiality measures.
privacy.your_options_and_rights_desc: You can opt-out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in those communications. Additionally, depending on your jurisdiction, you may have additional rights regarding your information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.
privacy.changes_to_this_policy_desc: We may change this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. If we make significant changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we will provide additional notice, such as an email.
privacy.contact_desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact us at

tos.title: Terms of Service - Giftstorming Ai
tos.heading: Terms of Service
tos.acceptance: By accessing or using the Giftstorming AI website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any of the terms, you should not access or use this website.
tos.access_and_use_desc: You may use this website and the gift idea generation services provided by Giftstorming AI in accordance with these terms and all applicable laws.
tos.guest_desc: You can use our services without registering, but with limitations on the number of ideas generated.
tos.registered_user_desc: By registering, you gain unlimited access to our generated ideas.
tos.prohibitions_desc: You may not use the site or services for illegal, fraudulent, or malicious purposes.
tos.ai_services_desc: Gift ideas are generated by artificial intelligence and are provided "as is" without warranties of accuracy or applicability.
tos.registration_desc: To register, you must provide true and accurate information, such as your name, email address, password, and keep it up to date.
tos.property_desc: All content, including text, images, and code, is owned by Giftstorming AI and is protected by intellectual property laws.
tos.limited_license_desc: We grant you a limited license to access and use the site and services for personal and non-commercial purposes.
tos.privacy_and_cookies_desc2: to understand how we collect and use your personal information.
tos.no_warranties_desc: Giftstorming AI's services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
tos.limitation_of_responsibility_desc: Giftstorming AI will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, etc., damages arising from the use or inability to use this site or the services.
tos.changes_to_terms_desc: We may modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after being posted on the website.
tos.law_and_jurisdiction_desc: These terms will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the United States and the European Union. Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts in these jurisdictions.
tos.contact_desc: If you have any questions about these terms, please do not hesitate to contact us at
